author: Sarah Mcphee
title: Coronavirus: Research finds transmission distance may be four metres
description: Coronavirus: Research finds transmission distance may be four metres news.com.au
content: Australians have been told to abide by the social distancing guideline of 1.5 metres while in New Zealand it's two metres. But research undertaken at an emergency field hospital in Wuhan, China, has found the transmission distance of SARS-CoV-2, the coronavir… [+3520 chars]
